changeSet.sql: CREATE Table IF NOT EXISTS receivers ( id INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, receiver varchar(250), PRIMARY KEY (id));

changeSet.sql: CREATE Table IF NOT EXISTS expenses ( id INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, paydate date, receiver INT, value decimal(10,2), PRIMARY KEY (id), FOREIGN KEY (receiver) REFERENCES receivers (id));
